summary: To develop and find a place in the industry where I can utilize my skills through serving efficiently and with complete honesty, integrity and hard work for personal and organizational growth.

experience.title: Store Keeper / Production Co-ordinator
experience.description: Maintained store facilities; placed orders for stock; kept records of materials received; stored supplies; tracked expenditures; reported to Production Manager; monitored store equipment; controlled stock levels; internal controls for stock accuracy; knowledge of export, PRO skills, ministry portals; generated ASN and shipment details.

experience.title: Store Manager
experience.description: Attained sales and financial targets; analyzed and interpreted financial goals; interviewed, hired and trained employees; promoted sales; maintained communication with Area Manager and home office; implemented promotional, operational and visual merchandise standards; opened/closed store; maintained displays; ensured customer service; managed cash handling and deposits; coordinated with teams.

experience.title: Category Management Incharge - Merchandising
experience.description: Managed front-end & back-end operations of the Diamond category; coordinated with departments; price updates for PAN India; handled margins and tag printing; resolved store issues; processed orders; MIS data; liaised with logistics & accounts for VAT/Waybill; prepared reports; stock vs sales analyses; improved resource utilization to increase sales.

experience.title: Team Leader
experience.description: Led team of 2 ATL's & 40 associates; scheduling; training and coaching; ensured cash tallies and deposits; backroom management; FIFO inventory; stock checks; floor replenishment; product pricing; customer service.

experience.title: Sr. Customer Service Executive
experience.description: Provided customer service; supervised employees; monitored sales activities; handled difficult sales; trained front-end staff; answered inquiries about new launches and usage plan; processed sales transactions.

education.school: CKT College of Arts,Commerce & Management Studies
